title: Configurations for Automapping between Cradles to Entrance Units
description: Configurations for Automapping between Cradles to Entrance Units

enableCradleAutomapping.description: Enable Automapping between Cradles and Entrance Units.

cradleDataRowRegex.description: Regular expression pattern to extract the row number from CradleData.

cradleDataEuFriendlyNameRegex.description: Regular expression pattern to extract the EU friendly name (WallNo) from CradleData.
